flowers.name: rose
flowers.desc: The rose is a type of flowering shrub. Its name comes from the Latin word Rosa.

flowers.name: lotus
flowers.desc: The history and symbolism of the lotus flower dates back thousands of years. Nothing is more spiritual than this flower.

flowers.name: marigold
flowers.desc: Marigolds are easy to grow, economical, bloom reliably all summer, and infrequently have insect and disease problems.

flowers.name: lily
flowers.desc: Lilies, one of the most beloved bulbs for the summer garden, burst in with kaboom blossoms at an interlude when most flowers are in a holding pattern.

flowers.name: tulip
flowers.desc: Tulips are a genus of spring-blooming perennial herbaceous bulbiferous geophytes. The flowers are usually large, showy and brightly coloured, generally red, pink, yellow, or white.
